channel.title: Project 16 v.16
channel.description:
I want to use Project16, but i just cant compile and run...
I have JDK 6.1, and this is my compiler.. [code]@echo off title P3anutScape Source color 0c
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now compiling server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java
echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo / \ echo / Now starting server... \ echo / \ echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server pause[/code]
Can anyone edit this compiler for me, OR say witch JDK i should use?
Tyvm :)

item.title: Project 16 v.16
item.dc:creator: @Robonator Robonator
item.description:
@Robonator wrote:

I want to use Project16, but i just cant compile and run…

I have JDK 6.1, and this is my compiler…

[code]@echo off
title P3anutScape Source
color 0c

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause[/code]

Can anyone edit this compiler for me, OR say witch JDK i should use?

Tyvm
